name: Travel Planet
description:
This game was held during a Game Jam lasting 3 days with the theme "Towards a new world".

We play as a small rocket that moves from planet to planet dodging asteroids.

The game consists of 5 levels with a planet to reach and asteroids in the colors of the conquered planet.

The last planet is endless so don't bother continuing after reaching Tuplica unless you really like this game!

The only control in the game is the left click.

This game is playable on Windows, Linux and Android.
